<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Merge the attributes of AdditionalNode into OriginalNode.  If attributes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with identical types are present, they are not duplicated but rather if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// their values are not consistent and error is thrown.  In addition, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// higher priority namespace is used for each attribute, EXCEPT in the case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of merging two default namespaces and the lower priority namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// definition occurs closer than the higher priority one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343a902b0d55fddef6f8d651fe1035b7d4bd">Error</a> mergeAttributes(xmlNodePtr OriginalNode,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             xmlNodePtr AdditionalNode) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  xmlNsPtr ClosestDefault = getClosestDefault(OriginalNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (xmlAttrPtr <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a> = AdditionalNode-&gt;properties; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">       <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>-&gt;next) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (xmlAttrPtr OriginalAttribute =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">            getAttribute(OriginalNode, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>-&gt;name)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!xmlStringsEqual(OriginalAttribute-&gt;children-&gt;content,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>-&gt;children-&gt;content)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9999bd897fc8a1648bd69b36fee2d357">make&#95;error&lt;WindowsManifestError&gt;</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Twine(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;conflicting attributes for &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="#ad2836b6eccf7a44ff548f568d27460bd">FROM&#95;XML&#95;CHAR</a>(OriginalNode-&gt;name));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>-&gt;ns) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!OriginalAttribute-&gt;ns) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = copyAttributeNamespace(OriginalAttribute, OriginalNode,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (namespaceOverrides(OriginalAttribute-&gt;ns-&gt;href,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>-&gt;ns-&gt;href)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this case, the original attribute has a higher priority namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// than the incomiing attribute, however the namespace definition of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the lower priority namespace occurs first traveling upwards in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tree.  Therefore the lower priority namespace is applied.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!OriginalAttribute-&gt;ns-&gt;prefix &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>-&gt;ns-&gt;prefix &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">            ClosestDefault &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">            xmlStringsEqual(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>-&gt;ns-&gt;href, ClosestDefault-&gt;href)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = copyAttributeNamespace(OriginalAttribute, OriginalNode,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This covers the case where the incoming attribute has the higher</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// priority.  The higher priority namespace is applied in all cases</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// EXCEPT when both of the namespaces are default inherited, and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// closest inherited default is the lower priority one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>-&gt;ns-&gt;prefix || OriginalAttribute-&gt;ns-&gt;prefix ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (ClosestDefault &amp;&amp; !xmlStringsEqual(OriginalAttribute-&gt;ns-&gt;href,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              ClosestDefault-&gt;href))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = copyAttributeNamespace(OriginalAttribute, OriginalNode,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the incoming attribute is not already found on the node, append it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the end of the properties list.  Also explicitly apply its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace as a prefix because it might be contained in a separate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace that doesn&#39;t use the attribute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">    xmlAttrPtr NewProp =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">        xmlNewProp(OriginalNode, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>-&gt;name, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>-&gt;children-&gt;content);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Expected&lt;xmlNsPtr&gt; ExplicitOrError =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">        searchOrDefine(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>-&gt;ns-&gt;href, OriginalNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ExplicitOrError)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ExplicitOrError.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected/#a94789df4ebd03dc008e8adebaa66ac1f">takeError</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewProp-&gt;ns = std::move(ExplicitOrError.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected/#ad26ecbb6920f4ea55f5ed4f64e52342d">get</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given two nodes, return the one with the higher priority namespace.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> xmlNodePtr getDominantNode(xmlNodePtr Node1, xmlNodePtr Node2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Node1 || !Node1-&gt;ns)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Node2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Node2 || !Node2-&gt;ns)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (namespaceOverrides(Node1-&gt;ns-&gt;href, Node2-&gt;ns-&gt;href))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Node1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Node2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Checks if this Node&#39;s namespace is inherited or one it defined itself.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> hasInheritedNs(xmlNodePtr Node) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;ns &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;ns != getNamespaceWithPrefix(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;ns-&gt;prefix, Node);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if this Node&#39;s namespace is a default namespace that it inherited, as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// opposed to defining itself.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> hasInheritedDefaultNs(xmlNodePtr Node) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> hasInheritedNs(Node) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;ns-&gt;prefix == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if this Node&#39;s namespace is a default namespace it defined itself.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> hasDefinedDefaultNamespace(xmlNodePtr Node) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;ns &amp;&amp; (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;ns == getNamespaceWithPrefix(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, Node));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the given explicit prefix-definition of a namespace, travel downwards</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from a node recursively, and for every implicit, inherited default usage of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that namespace replace it with that explicit prefix use.  This is important</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when namespace overriding occurs when merging, so that elements unique to a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace will still stay in that namespace.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> explicateNamespace(xmlNsPtr PrefixDef, xmlNodePtr Node) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If a node as its own default namespace definition it clearly cannot have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inherited the given default namespace, and neither will any of its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// children.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (hasDefinedDefaultNamespace(Node))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;ns &amp;&amp; xmlStringsEqual(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;ns-&gt;href, PrefixDef-&gt;href) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">      hasInheritedDefaultNs(Node))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;ns = PrefixDef;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (xmlAttrPtr <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;properties; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">       <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>-&gt;next) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>-&gt;ns &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">        xmlStringsEqual(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>-&gt;ns-&gt;href, PrefixDef-&gt;href)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343af2bbdf9f72c085adc4d0404e370f0f4c">Attribute</a>-&gt;ns = PrefixDef;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (xmlNodePtr Child = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;children; Child; Child = Child-&gt;next) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">    explicateNamespace(PrefixDef, Child);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Perform the namespace merge between two nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343a902b0d55fddef6f8d651fe1035b7d4bd">Error</a> mergeNamespaces(xmlNodePtr OriginalNode,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             xmlNodePtr AdditionalNode) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Save the original default namespace definition in case the incoming node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// overrides it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;OriginalDefinedDefaultHref = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (xmlNsPtr OriginalDefinedDefaultNs =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">          getNamespaceWithPrefix(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, OriginalNode)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OriginalDefinedDefaultHref = xmlStrdup(OriginalDefinedDefaultNs-&gt;href);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;NewDefinedDefaultHref = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Copy all namespace definitions.  There can only be one default namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// definition per node, so the higher priority one takes precedence in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case of collision.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (xmlNsPtr Def = AdditionalNode-&gt;nsDef; Def; Def = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>-&gt;next) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (xmlNsPtr OriginalNsDef =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">            getNamespaceWithPrefix(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>-&gt;prefix, OriginalNode)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>-&gt;prefix) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (namespaceOverrides(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>-&gt;href, OriginalNsDef-&gt;href)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">          NewDefinedDefaultHref = <a href="#a4d9312f5f8701ab515f40eaebea307b8">TO&#95;XML&#95;CHAR</a>(strdup(<a href="#ad2836b6eccf7a44ff548f568d27460bd">FROM&#95;XML&#95;CHAR</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>-&gt;href)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!xmlStringsEqual(OriginalNsDef-&gt;href, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>-&gt;href)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9999bd897fc8a1648bd69b36fee2d357">make&#95;error&lt;WindowsManifestError&gt;</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Twine(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;conflicting namespace definitions for &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="#ad2836b6eccf7a44ff548f568d27460bd">FROM&#95;XML&#95;CHAR</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>-&gt;prefix));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">      xmlNsPtr NewDef = xmlCopyNamespace(Def);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewDef-&gt;next = OriginalNode-&gt;nsDef;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OriginalNode-&gt;nsDef = NewDef;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether the original node or the incoming node has the higher</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// priority namespace.  Depending on which one is dominant, we will have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to recursively apply namespace changes down to children of the original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">  xmlNodePtr DominantNode = getDominantNode(OriginalNode, AdditionalNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">  xmlNodePtr NonDominantNode =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DominantNode == OriginalNode ? AdditionalNode : OriginalNode;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DominantNode == OriginalNode) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OriginalDefinedDefaultHref) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">      xmlNsPtr NonDominantDefinedDefault =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">          getNamespaceWithPrefix(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, NonDominantNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this case, both the nodes defined a default namespace.  However</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the lower priority node ended up having a higher priority default</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// definition.  This can occur if the higher priority node is prefix</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace defined.  In this case we have to define an explicit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prefix for the overridden definition and apply it to all children</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// who relied on that definition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NonDominantDefinedDefault &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">          namespaceOverrides(NonDominantDefinedDefault-&gt;href,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             OriginalDefinedDefaultHref)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Expected&lt;xmlNsPtr&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">            searchOrDefine(OriginalDefinedDefaultHref, DominantNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!EC) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>.takeError();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">        xmlNsPtr PrefixDominantDefinedDefault = std::move(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>.get());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">        explicateNamespace(PrefixDominantDefinedDefault, DominantNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this case the node with a higher priority namespace did not have a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// default namespace definition, but the lower priority node did.  In this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case the new default namespace definition is copied.  A side effect of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this is that all children will suddenly find themselves in a different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// default namespace.  To maintain correctness we need to ensure that all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// children now explicitly refer to the namespace that they had previously</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// implicitly inherited.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (getNamespaceWithPrefix(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, NonDominantNode)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DominantNode-&gt;parent) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">        xmlNsPtr ClosestDefault = getClosestDefault(DominantNode-&gt;parent);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Expected&lt;xmlNsPtr&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">            searchOrDefine(ClosestDefault-&gt;href, DominantNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!EC) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>.takeError();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">        xmlNsPtr ExplicitDefault = std::move(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>.get());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">        explicateNamespace(ExplicitDefault, DominantNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Covers case where the incoming node has a default namespace definition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that overrides the original node&#39;s namespace.  This always leads to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the original node receiving that new default namespace.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (hasDefinedDefaultNamespace(DominantNode)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NonDominantNode-&gt;ns = getNamespaceWithPrefix(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, NonDominantNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This covers the case where the incoming node either has a prefix</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace, or an inherited default namespace.  Since the namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may not yet be defined in the original tree we do a searchOrDefine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for it, and then set the namespace equal to it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Expected&lt;xmlNsPtr&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">          searchOrDefine(DominantNode-&gt;ns-&gt;href, NonDominantNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!EC) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>.takeError();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">      xmlNsPtr Explicit = std::move(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>.get());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NonDominantNode-&gt;ns = Explicit;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This covers cases where the incoming dominant node HAS a default</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace definition, but MIGHT NOT NECESSARILY be in that namespace.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (xmlNsPtr DominantDefaultDefined =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">            getNamespaceWithPrefix(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, DominantNode)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OriginalDefinedDefaultHref) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (namespaceOverrides(DominantDefaultDefined-&gt;href,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               OriginalDefinedDefaultHref)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this case, the incoming node&#39;s default definition overrides</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the original default definition, all children who relied on that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// definition must be updated accordingly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Expected&lt;xmlNsPtr&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">              searchOrDefine(OriginalDefinedDefaultHref, NonDominantNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!EC) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>.takeError();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">          explicateNamespace(ExplicitDefault, NonDominantNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The original did not define a default definition, however the new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// default definition still applies to all children, so they must be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// updated to explicitly refer to the namespace they had previously</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Expected&lt;xmlNsPtr&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">            searchOrDefine(ClosestDefault-&gt;href, NonDominantNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!EC) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>.takeError();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">        explicateNamespace(ExplicitDefault, NonDominantNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = treeMerge(OriginalChildWithName, Child)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> stripComments(xmlNodePtr Root) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Child = &amp;StoreNext;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">    xmlUnlinkNode(Remove);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// libxml2 assumes that attributes do not inherit default namespaces, whereas</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the original  mt.exe does make this assumption.  This function reconciles</span></CodeLine>
